scripts.build-core: ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-core --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-material --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-api --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-ui --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-state --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-ui-pg --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-profile-core --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-thesaurus-ui --configuration=production
scripts.build-pag: ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-admin --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-browser-hierarchy --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-item-editor --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-item-list --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-item-search --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-layer-demo --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-login --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-reset-password --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-thesaurus-editor --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-thesaurus-list --configuration=production && ng build @myrmidon/cadmus-user --configuration=production
scripts.build-all: npm run-script build-core && npm run-script build-gen && npm run-script build-phi && npm run-script build-pag && npm run build-gr
